member.name: OnnxTransform
member.remarks:
The OnnxTransform provides ability to score ONNX machine learning models. See Onnx. The transform takes as input the ONNX model, as well as IDV formatted feature vectors, to produce a vector-valued column of generated scores.
The transform currently accepts the ONNX Model Zoo models as input.
The transform supports scoring only one example at a time.
The name of input column should match the name of input node in ONNX model.
The name of the output column should match the output column node in the ONNX model.
Currently, float is only acceptable data type for input/output.
Upon success, the transform will introduce a new column in with to the output name specified.
The inputs and outputs of an ONNX model can be obtained using the Netron tool .
